content: The Fireproof Mantle has two effects. Having it equipped significantly increases Burn resistance, and grants immunity to Scorch damage from lava-covered terrain in the game. While, activating the Vessel in combat will, for a short duration after activation, grants Burn immunity and gradually increases Focus. There are specific lava-filled environments where this will be extremely effective.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fireproof_Mantle.md', within the main section titled 'Fireproof Mantle'.
The content is as follows:
The Fireproof Mantle has two effects. Having it equipped significantly increases Burn resistance, and grants immunity to Scorch damage from lava-covered terrain in the game. While, activating the Vessel in combat will, for a short duration after activation, grants Burn immunity and gradually increases Focus. There are specific lava-filled environments where this will be extremely effective.
